item.description:
Join us for the first ever Allston Pub Crawl! If you're on a fixed income, this crawl has some great deals!

Join "Boston Bar Scene" on Facebook to get notifications of events sent right to your FB account:

BostonBarScene@groups.facebook.com

 

1. Joshua Tree (Allston-NOT SOMERVILLE): 4PM

Special: $2 Pint Coors, $3 Gin & Tonic, $3 Mystery Shot

Distance from Griggs St. T Stop: Literally across the street

 

2. Tavern in the Square: 5PM

Special: $3 Pint Coors, $11 Pitchers Coors

Distance from last bar: 0.5 Miles

 

3. The Draft: 6PM

Special: $2.50 High Life

Distance from last bar: 0.2 Miles

 

4. Patron's (formerly Big City): 7PM

Note: You have to go up stairs, it's next to Sunset Grill

Special: Yard Drink (3' long glass you can take with you, price varies but Coors Lite is about $20), drink specials change week to week but beers are generally $5

Distance from last bar: 0.2 Miles

 

5. White Horse Tavern: 8PM

Special: TBA announced in February but generally the special is $2.50 for a beer

Distance from last bar: 256'

 

BEFORE YOU LEAVE: Check this schedule as locations may change the day of the event

IF YOU CANNOT GET IN: Sometimes the bars are over crowded, just head to the next bar and wait for the crew to arrive

COVER CHARGE: The management has told me there are no covers, but in the event that a manager goes rogue, I will take the crawl onto the next bar

SCHEDULE: Print this schedule and bring it with you in case you get separated

AFTER PARTY: There are tons of other bars we can chill at - Patron's has pool tables and there's pizzerias

RSVP: RSVP now if you're interested and just remember to change your RSVP the day of the event if you can't come, I need an accurate head count

DO NOT DOUBLE BOOK: Only RSVP on one site where this is posted

FACEBOOK: Please post this on your FB and invite friends
item.name: Cheap Drinks Pub Crawl Allston-$2 Pints, $3 Mystery Shots, 3' long drinks
